summary: Simple mod which upgrades werewolf gameplay.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://s13.postimage.org/4tl5374qv/pic02.jpg[/img]
[color=Tan][u]Description:[/u][/color]

[color=Darkgray]This mod improves lycanthropy by changing and adding couple of new abilities. Only werewolf form is modified, not human form (except that "Weakness to Silver" ability is gained in human form too). These changes apply only for player, not for npc werewolves.[/color] [u]Requires Dawnguard expansion[/u][color=Darkgray].[/color]


[color=Tan][u]Modified:[/u][/color]
[list]
[color=Darkgray][*]"Totem of the Predator" perk increase "Scent of Blood" detection range to[/color] 300 [color=Darkgray]feet. Without perk the detection range is[/color] 200[color=Darkgray] feet.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]"Howl of Terror" duration is reduced to[/color]  20 [color=Darkgray]seconds and range is reduced to[/color] 75[color=Darkgray] feet but effectiveness is increased to level [/color]25[color=Darkgray]. Silver Hand faction members are immune to "Howl of Terror".[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]"Totem of Terror" perk increase "Howl of Terror" effectiveness up to level[/color] 50[color=Darkgray].[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]"Howl of the Pack" have[/color] 20 [color=Darkgray]seconds cooldown.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Feeding on corpses restores health by [/color]75 [color=Darkgray]points.[/color]

[color=Darkgray][*]Pack Members stats are:[/color]
[/list] 
[color=Darkgray]Spirit Wolf = Level[/color] 5[color=Darkgray] and[/color] 80[color=Darkgray] health.[/color]
[color=Darkgray]Ice Wolf = Level[/color] 10[color=Darkgray] and[/color] 160[color=Darkgray] health.[/color]
[color=Darkgray]Werewolf = Level[/color] 15[color=Darkgray] and[/color] 240[color=Darkgray] health.[/color]
[list]
[color=Darkgray][*]Health bonus depends on player's level:[/color]
[/list] 
[color=Darkgray]Level[/color] 1[color=Darkgray]-[/color]10[color=Darkgray]  = [/color]100
[color=Darkgray]Level[/color] 11[color=Darkgray]-[/color]15[color=Darkgray] = [/color]106
[color=Darkgray]Level[/color] 16[color=Darkgray]-[/color]20[color=Darkgray] = [/color]112
[color=Darkgray]Level[/color] 21[color=Darkgray]-[/color]25[color=Darkgray] = [/color]118
[color=Darkgray]Level[/color] 26[color=Darkgray]-[/color]30[color=Darkgray] = [/color]124
[color=Darkgray]Level[/color] 31[color=Darkgray]-[/color]35[color=Darkgray] = [/color]130
[color=Darkgray]Level[/color] 36[color=Darkgray]-[/color]40[color=Darkgray] = [/color]136
[color=Darkgray]Level[/color] 41[color=Darkgray]-[/color]49[color=Darkgray] = [/color]148
[color=Darkgray]Level[/color] 50[color=Darkgray] and above =[/color] 150


[color=Tan][u]New:[/u][/color]
[list]
[color=Darkgray][*]Player is immune to all damage during transforming into werewolf.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Health regenerates at rate of[/color] 1,5[color=Darkgray]% of maximum health per second.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Feeding on corpses restores stamina by[/color] 75 [color=Darkgray]points.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]"Weakness to Silver" ability.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Falling damage is reduced by[/color] 75[color=Darkgray]%.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Magic resistance is increased by[/color] 15[color=Darkgray]%.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Every howl have a secondary effect. Holding shout button down toggles Night-Eye. It has duration of[/color] 120 [color=Darkgray]seconds.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Wolves and werewolves no longer attack player on sight in human form.[/color]
[/list] 

[color=Tan][u]Ranks:[/u][/color]
[list]
[color=Darkgray][*]Cub = Start rank.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Savage = [/color]20[color=Darkgray] days as a werewolf.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Brute = [/color]60 [color=Darkgray]days as a werewolf.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Skinwalker = [/color]120 [color=Darkgray]days as a werewolf.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Beastmaster = [/color]200 [color=Darkgray]days as a werewolf.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Vargr = [/color]300 [color=Darkgray]days as a werewolf.[/color]
[/list] 

[color=Tan][u]Bonuses:[/u][/color]
[list]
[color=Darkgray][*]Cub = Nothing.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Savage = Movement speed is increased by[/color] 3[color=Darkgray]%.  Attacks have[/color] 10[color=Darkgray]% chance to do[/color] 50[color=Darkgray]% more damage.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Brute = Movement speed is increased by[/color] 6[color=Darkgray]%.  Sprinting into targets knocks them down. [/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Skinwalker = Movement speed is increased by[/color] 9[color=Darkgray]%.  Standing power attacks hit all targets in front of player.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Beastmaster = Movement speed is increased by[/color] 12[color=Darkgray]%. Attacks ignore [/color]50[color=Darkgray]% of targets armor.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Vargr = Movement speed is increased by [/color]15[color=Darkgray]%. Player gains immunity to iron and steel weapons.[/color]
[/list] 

[color=Tan][u]Note:[/u][/color] [color=Darkgray]Transforming into werewolf and back to human form will cause bugs to your character if you change your race after you have completed the Companions "Take Up Arms" quest. "Weakness to Silver" and "Rank" abilities don't get removed if player cure himself of lycanthropy. Only way to remove those is by deleting the mod (for now).[/color]

[color=Tan][u]Installation:[/u][/color] [color=Darkgray]Extract files to Skyrim/Data folder. Use launcher and in data files select WerewolfUpgrade.esp. In game, if you already possess Beast Form power, you have to transform into werewolf to get scripts run properly. [/color]

[color=Tan][u]Uninstallation:[/u][/color] [color=Darkgray]Delete all files.[/color]

[color=Tan][u]Compatibility:[/u][/color] [color=Darkgray]This mod is not compatible with mods that change [/color]PlayerWerewolfChangeScript[color=Darkgray].[/color]

[color=Tan][u]Credit:[/u][/color] LFox[color=Darkgray] for making weakness to silver weapons work as intended and showing me how to do it.[/color]

[color=Tan][u]My other mods:[/u][/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5863]Vampire Upgrade[/url] [color=Darkgray]-[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33405/] Expert Concentration Spells[/url] [color=Darkgray]-[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34620/] Lore Friendly Spells[/url]
author: undomir

files.name: WerewolfUpgrade
files.changelogHtml: Fixed higher rank Howl of Terror from affecting Silver Hand faction members.
